<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentOffset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit an array of FileChecksum entries. We index into this table using the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// user-provided file number.  Each entry may be a variable number of bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// determined by the checksum kind and size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> File : Files) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurrentOffset += 4; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// String table offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!File.ChecksumKind) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentOffset +=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">          4; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One byte each for checksum size and kind, then align to 4 bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentOffset += 2; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One byte each for checksum size and kind.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentOffset += File.Checksum.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(CurrentOffset, 4);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Output checksum table offset of the given file number.  It is possible that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not all files have been registered yet, and so the offset cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculated.  In this case a symbol representing the offset is emitted, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the value of this symbol will be fixed up at a later time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeviewcontext/#a73ba925c2a5e09782525ede9dc691059"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeviewcontext/#a73ba925c2a5e09782525ede9dc691059">CodeViewContext::emitFileChecksumOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer">MCObjectStreamer</a> &amp;OS,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only add the location if it differs from the previous location.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LastLabel ? <a href="#a2ea528bf7b0254b3ae2e1c0864022767">computeLabelDiff</a>(Asm, LastLabel, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.first) : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RangeSize = <a href="#a2ea528bf7b0254b3ae2e1c0864022767">computeLabelDiff</a>(Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.first, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.second);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LastLabel = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write down each range where the variable is defined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, E = Frag.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccvdefrangefragment/#a3959776b75cad0ae0cb14c16b2454150">getRanges</a>().size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the range size of multiple consecutive ranges is under the max,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// combine the ranges and emit some gaps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;RangeBegin = Frag.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccvdefrangefragment/#a3959776b75cad0ae0cb14c16b2454150">getRanges</a>()&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RangeSize = GapAndRangeSizes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> J = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; J != E; ++J) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RangeSize + GapAndRangeSize &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a25ab8c1ee55e8f8046faa4da99da5f55a2fa4bac49a23af56c1a3fcd0da807d44">MaxDefRange</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RangeSize += GapAndRangeSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bias = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We must split the range into chunks of MaxDefRange, this is a fundamental</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// limitation of the file format.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"></CodeLine>
